jxi.world
Class World

java.lang.Object
  jxi.world.World

public class World
extends java.lang.Object

The internal world representation of everything that is sent through by UsarCommander For now only one robot is assumed. A lot of class variables should be changed to arrays if * several robots are used. For example robotX should be an array
